00020 using System;
00021 using System.Collections.Generic;
00022 using System.Text;
00023 using System.IO;
00024 using System.Diagnostics;
00025 using System.Text.RegularExpressions;

00027 namespace Crossfade
00028 {
00032         public sealed class FileInfo
00033         {
00034                 static readonly FileInfo instance = new FileInfo();
00035 
00039                 static FileInfo()
00040                 {
00041                 }
00042 
00043                 public static FileInfo Instance
00044                 {
00045                         get
00046                         {
00047                                 return instance;
00048                         }
00049                 }
00050 
00051                 FileInfo()
00052                 {
00053                 }
00054 
00062                 public Media getInfo(Media media)
00063                 {
00064                         if (media.uri.Scheme == Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00065                         {
00066                                 System.IO.FileInfo fi = new System.IO.FileInfo(media.uri.LocalPath);
00067 
00068                                 if (media.MTime != fi.LastWriteTime)
00069                                 {
00070                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("MTime modified, re-reading FileInfo: " + media.uri);
00071 
00072                                         /* Filehash */
00073                                         try
00074                                         {
00075                                                 if (media.Type != Media.MediaType.Video)
00076                                                 {
00077                                                         fiHash hash = new fiHash(media.uri);
00078                                                         media.SHA1Sum = hash.SHA256;
00079                                                 }
00080 
00081                                                 if (media.uri.LocalPath.ToLower().EndsWith(".cda"))
00082                                                 {
00083                                                         media.Album = "Unknown Audio CD";
00084                                                         media.Artist = "Unknown";
00085                                                         media.Title = media.uri.LocalPath.ToString();
00086                                                         
00087                                                         /* fixme, get length of audio track here */
00088                                                         //media.Length = ;
00089 
00090                                                         string trackname = Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension(media.uri.LocalPath);
00091                                                         string alphabet = "abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ.";
00092                                                         string tracknr = trackname.Trim(alphabet.ToCharArray());
00093 
00094                                                         try
00095                                                         {
00096                                                                 media.TrackNr = Convert.ToUInt32(tracknr);
00097                                                         }
00098                                                         catch (InvalidCastException)
00099                                                         {
00100                                                                 media.TrackNr = 1;
00101                                                         }
00102                                                 }
00103                                                 else if (media.Type == Media.MediaType.Audio)
00104                                                 {
00105                                                         /* Taglib */
00106                                                         LibraryTagLib tl = new LibraryTagLib(media.uri);
00107                                                         media.TrackNr = tl.Tracknr;
00108                                                         media.Title = tl.Title;
00109                                                         media.Album = tl.Album;
00110                                                         media.Artist = tl.Artist;
00111                                                         media.Year = tl.Year;
00112                                                         media.Genre = tl.Genre;
00113                                                         media.Comment = tl.Comment;
00114                                                         media.Composer = tl.Composer;
00115                                                         media.Copyright = tl.Copyright;
00116                                                         media.Length = tl.Length;
00117                                                         media.Rating = tl.Rating;
00118                                                         if (media.Album == "" && media.Title == "" && media.Artist == "")
00119                                                         {
00120                                                                 string media_file = media.uri.LocalPath;
00121                                                                 media.Title = media_file.Substring(media_file.LastIndexOf("\\") + 1);
00122                                                         }
00123                                                 }
00124                                                 else if (media.Type == Media.MediaType.Picture)
00125                                                 {
00126                                                         string media_file = media.uri.LocalPath;
00127                                                         media.Title = media_file.Substring(media_file.LastIndexOf("\\") + 1);
00128                                                         media.Artist = "(Image)";
00129                                                         media.Length = 10000;
00130                                                 }
00131                                                 else if (media.Type == Media.MediaType.Video)
00132                                                 {
00133                                                         string media_file = media.uri.LocalPath;
00134                                                         media.Title = media_file.Substring(media_file.LastIndexOf("\\") + 1);
00135                                                         media.Artist = "(Video)";
00136                                                 }
00137                                                 else
00138                                                 {
00139                                                         media.Title = "(Unknown)";
00140                                                         media.Artist = "(Unknown)";
00141                                                         media.Album = "(Unknown)";
00142                                                 }
00143 
00144                                                 /* LastWriteTime */
00145                                                 media.MTime = fi.LastWriteTime;
00146                                         }
00147                                         catch (IOException ex)
00148                                         {
00149                                                 throw ex;
00150                                         }
00151                                 }
00152                                 else
00153                                 {
00154                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print("MTime not modified, skipping FileInfo: " + media.uri);
00155                                 }
00156                         }
00157 
00158                         return media;
00159                 }
00160         }
00161 }
